title: Agile-Based Educational Resource Adoption and Institutionalization Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical knowledge and instructional operations experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing educational resource management competencies using VR simulations and agile methodologies within smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can agilely select and apply personalized mathematics educational resources
Learners can design distributed resource management strategies through practical problems in VR simulation environments
The educational resource improvement process utilizing sprint cycles can be iteratively executed at least three times

resources: Low-Spec VR Mathematics Education Content Package

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
